column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday November 19 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Leestown Rd at the Scott Co line:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions until further notice due to investigation of a serious multi-vehicle collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for Leestown Rd at the Scott Co line:
column4: Outbound Leestown Rd traffic is being diverted to Yarnallton Pike.

column3: Traffic Alert for Leestown Rd at the Scott Co line:
column4: Inbound traffic from Scott Co is being diverted to US-62 / Paynes Depot Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Leestown Rd at the Scott Co line:
column4: UPDATE 3:08 p.m. - The roadway is back open in both directions.
